availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Richard H. Johnson (Madison County, Kentucky, grocer and magistrate )

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, grocer and magistrate. Indiana native. Married to Susan Goodloe Johnson in Madison County, Kentucky, on October 3, 1856. Father of Almira O. Johnson, William C. Johnson, Milbry Johnson, Curran Johnson, and Richard Harvey Johnson. Grocer in Madison County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Madison County in 1860. Appointed as magistrate in Madison County on November 7, 1862.

ab.bibl:

KYR-0001-031-0038.
